text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Fortnite. The build quality of the Razer Blade 15 RZ09-02705E76-R3U1 15.6" 60 Hz Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 128 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Razer Blade 15 RZ09-02705E76-R3U1 15.6" 60 Hz Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 128 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

The Razer Blade 15 RZ09-02705E76-R3U1 15.6" 60 Hz Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 128 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for AAA gaming, but the speakers could be better. Had a minor issue with the initial setup taking longer than expected, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the Razer Blade 15 RZ09-02705E76-R3U1 15.6" 60 Hz Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 128 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 is good, but I expected a bit more from the build material on the Razer Blade 15 RZ09-02705E76-R3U1 15.6" 60 Hz Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 128 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.
